Your treatment experience step by step

Your comfort is our priority. The procedure begins with gentle skin preparation. For the next 45-60 minutes, HIFU and radiofrequency technologies work synergistically while you relax comfortably. Most patients describe the experience as deeply relaxing.

You'll notice immediate improvement in firmness, with results continuing to develop over the following weeks. The skin becomes smoother and the buttocks more defined with each session. You can resume all normal activities immediately after treatment.

Frequently asked questions about non-surgical butt lift

The number of sessions varies according to your goals and initial skin condition. Generally, we recommend 8-12 sessions, performed weekly or every 10 days. During your free consultation, we'll evaluate your case and design a personalized protocol.

Results can be maintained long-term with a healthy lifestyle and periodic maintenance sessions. The treatment stimulates natural collagen production and muscle toning. We recommend maintenance sessions every 1-2 months after the initial protocol.

No, the treatment is virtually painless. Most of our patients describe it as a relaxing experience. You might experience slight temporary redness that disappears within a few hours.

You'll notice immediate improvement in firmness from the first session. Optimal results develop progressively during treatment, with notable improvement in shape and lift after 4-6 sessions.

Yes, you can maintain your normal exercise routine immediately after treatment. In fact, combining the treatment with regular exercise enhances results and helps maintain them long-term.

Yes, our protocol adapts to different body types and goals. Whether you're looking for more firmness, lift, definition, or cellulite reduction, we customize the treatment to achieve your specific objectives.
